column.name: SFHB
column.comment: <font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>

column.name: SJLY
column.option: 0|本系统;1|原投行系统;2|协同系统

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_GS_NHLC_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: LXFS
column.option: 1|线上内核表决;2|线下内核表决

column.name: XMZHFNHBYJ
column.describe: 项目组回复内核办意见

column.name: SFYQTSBCLFQYY
column.describe: 是否用全套申报材料发起用印

column.name: OASPXX
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_NHLC' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: XMZFKNHBBS
column.describe: 项目组反馈内核办标识
